Class Menu

  • Method Details

    • mainMenu

      public void mainMenu(UnorderedListADT<String> missionCodes, Importer importer)
      Method that represents the main menu of the game
      Parameters:
      missionCodes - the available missions
      importer - the importer to load the missions

    • startGameMenu

      public void startGameMenu(Missions missions, UnorderedListADT<String> missionCodes, Importer importer, Exporter exporter)
      Method that represents the start game menu
      Parameters:
      missions - the missions class to store the simulations of the game
      missionCodes - the available missions
      importer - the importer to load the mission map . Everytime we want to play again the same mission i have to import the map again from the file to reinitialize the enemies , etc
      exporter - the exporter to save the missions

    • confirmRoomEntry

      public boolean confirmRoomEntry(Room selectedRoom, Hero hero, OrderedListADT<Room> path) throws HeroException
      Method that represents the menu confirmation to enter the start room
      Parameters:
      selectedRoom - the selected room
      hero - the hero to add to the room
      path - the path to add the room to the path list
      Returns:
      true if the room is confirmed, false otherwise
      Throws:
      HeroException - if the hero cannot be added to the room
